item.title: Xlstm
item.description: This project explores the predictability of cricket matches by leveraging machine learning techniques. As part of Assignment 3 in a machine learning course at IIT Delhi, the goal was to predict the winner of white-ball matches (ODIs and T20s) based on the first innings score and match metadata. A couple of weeks ago, my Twitter feed was flooded with discussions about the new xLSTM paper. Curious, I took a quick look at it.
